solution.text:
We have two concentric circles
Area of the colored region= Area of the sector (OCD) - area of the sector(OAB)
given that angle subtended by both sector\(=\theta =\angle COD=_{k}_^\circ\)
Area of the colored region= \(\pi \times OD^2 \times \frac {\theta}{360} - \pi \times OB^2 \times \frac {\theta}{360}\)
Area of the colored region= \(\pi \times _{{j+4}}_^2 \times \frac {_{k}_}{360} - \pi \times _{j}_^2 \times \frac {_{k}_}{360}\)
\(\Rightarrow area= _{{trunc(pi_val*(16+8*j)*k/360,2)}}_\)

content.text:
If OB = _{j}_cm and OD=_{{j+4}}_cm
If \(\angle COD=_{k}_^\circ\) find the area of the colored region of the figure
